articles.description: New Delhi: Oppo A77 4G has been launched in the Indian market today. The newly unveiled Oppo A77 4G features a dual rear camera setup of 50-megapixel and packs a 5000mAh battery with 33W SuperVOOC fast charging support.Oppo A77: Price in India and Av

articles.title: Google Pixel 7 with Tensor 2 SoC expected to launch in October 2022 - India Today
articles.description: Google did not officially launch the Pixel 6 series in India, but it made the Pixel 6a official in India a couple of weeks ago.
articles.content: Google may soon launch a successor to the Pixel 6. As per rumor mills, Google Pixel 7 is slated to hit the global market in October this year. There has been no official word by Google about the same… [+2546 chars]
